gym_esper_020_receptionist_01:
Welcome to the Alfornada Gym! Would you like
me to explain the rules of the Gym Test again?
gym_esper_020_receptionist_02: The Gym Test here is a special kind of [clr:6]exercise[clr:0]!
gym_esper_020_receptionist_03:
I’m talking about the [clr:6]Emotional Spectrum[clr:0]
[clr:6]Practice[clr:0] created by Tulip herself, of course.\r
Complete it, and you pass the test!
gym_esper_020_receptionist_04:
Head out of the Gym and turn left to find the
practice area.\c
The woman wearing a black tracksuit will explain
the rules to you there.
gym_esper_020_trainer_01:
Osu! Welcome, new kid! This is where we do
Emotional Spectrum Practice.[npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_02:
Why is your battle studies teacher here at a
Pokémon Gym working as an instructor, you ask?[npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_03:
Well, I’ve been friends with the Gym Leader
here, Tulip, since we were kids.[npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_25:
We decided to have a Pokémon battle with a
special rule—the loser has to do what the winner\r
says. So we battled, and, well...[npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_26:
Look, never mind what happened! Point is, this is
a chance to both get a workout in and help my\r
friend when I don’t have classes![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_04:
The rules of Emotional Spectrum Practice—or ESP
for short—are simple!\c
I’ll show you a certain movement, and all you
have to do is copy it![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_05:
Ready to get this Gym Test started? I hope your
body and mind are ready for the challenge![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_06:
Great! Let’s get to exercising! Show me an
eruption of emotions![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_07:
OK! Preparation is important, after all. Come
talk to me again when you’re good and ready![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_08:
Nice! You’re moving really well! Both you and
your Pokémon are looking great, new kid![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_27:
That was awesome! I can’t stop grinning after
witnessing such perfect power of expression![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_09:
That’s enough of a warm-up! Now let’s really put
those muscles to work with a Pokémon battle![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_battle_a_01:
You gotta keep moving! This is no ordinary
battle—this is a workout!
gym_esper_020_trainer_10:
Great! I can hear your Pokémon AND your
muscles screaming with delight![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_11:
I see you’re getting tired, but you’ve gotta hang
in there! Time to start the second half![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_12:
Covered in sweat and overflowing with emotion!
That was an impressive round![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_28:
That was perfect! I almost lost track of who was
teaching who![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_24:
Don’t give up yet! It’s time for another battle!
Hold out against all that lactic acid![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_battle_b_01:
My goal is to grow strong and build muscle.
Any tips?
gym_esper_020_trainer_13:
Good job! You made it all the way through the
ESP exercise![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_14:
You passed this test—no doubt about it!
Congratulations![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_15:
But you’re not done yet! Sprint over to the lobby
staffer on the double!\c
You have to report your passing grade to
formally finish the Gym Test![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_16:
Awww, that was close! But it looks like you may
need to train a bit harder before you can take\r
on the Psychic-type Gym for real![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_17:
If you don’t plan on giving up, come back again
sometime and show me what you’re made of![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_18:
Welcome back to the Emotional Spectrum
Practice area, new kid![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_23:
Yo, new kid! Are you ready to try the Gym Test
again starting from a Pokémon battle?[npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_trainer_29:
Great! I was hoping you’d say that. Let’s get
those muscles warmed up and ready to go![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_10: Recall something that made you angry![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_11: Give me your best angry face![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_14: Look surprised! Give it all you’ve got![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_17: Show me excitement like you mean it![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_18: Let’s kick it into the next gear![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_19: Let’s make it even more interesting![npcn:24]
gym_esper_020_game_21: Time to take it to the limit—and beyond![npcn:24]
